alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:36PM CDT until July 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL DALE AND SOUTHWESTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 336 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abbeville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Headland, Newville, Sylvan Grove, Echo, Tumbleton, Kirkland Crossroads, Blackwood, Capps, Grandberry Crossroads, Murphy Station, Graball, Goldberg Field, Headland Municipal A/P, Dancey, Abbeville Municipal A/P and Balkum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
